2068700.name: Fly Free
2068700.description:
Fly free is a quasi-realistic flight simulator.
Put yourself in the cockpit of a jet, propeller plane, and more.
You can attempt to survive harsh conditions, glide around beautiful mountain scenery or achieve top speeds or altitudes as you explore..
Maybe you can unlock secrets somewhere along the way.

TLDR;

Arcade?
No.

Sim?
No.

Fun?
Yup.

I am planning on implementing exciting campaigns, heartwarming stories, and more.
Now.

THIS GAME WILL ALWAYS BE FREE.

signed,
= Chill =
2068700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
